column1: Appellant)  was  indicted  for  committing  murder  of  Thammita  Arachchilage
Chandrasena  alias  Sunil  on  13/08/2006  which  is  an  offence  punishable
under Section 296 of the Penal Code.

column2:
the  Learned  High  Court  Judge  has 
found

column1: Appellant guilty of the charge and sentenced him to death on 14/09/2016.
Being  aggrieved  by  the  aforesaid  conviction  and  sentence  the  Appellant
preferred this appeal to this court.
